items.text: back of a length outside off, and Mushfiqur waits for the delivery to come to him, before opening his bat's face and running this down to third man for a single
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, and he defends this past the bowler to mid on. Mithun wants the single, so he's halfway down the pitch, but Mushfiqur says no. The non-striker has to hurry back
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to drive through the ball's line. Struck well, but straight to mid off
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball just outside off, and Mushfiqur's front-foot drive comes off the bat's inside half. Splices the shot to mid on
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up right outside off stump, and he caresses a front-foot drive past the bowler's left to long off
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and he shuffles across to the off side to get inside the line of the ball... and then paddles a sweep right over the fielder at short fine leg! Excellent shot
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: uses his feet to this length ball outside off. Taps it towards cover point and wants the run, but the non-striker says no
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he attempts to slog-sweep. Mistimes the shot to deep backward square
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: length ball on middle stump, and he misses the flick off his pads. The ball hits his front leg, but impact's nowhere near the line
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he waits for the angling ball to come to him, before slapping a square cut to the fielder placed in the deep
items.shortText: Mohammad Nawaz to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Here's Malik, from around the wicket
items.text: lands a length delivery outside leg stump, and he clips this off his pads to the leg side
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full outside leg stump, and he pushes this away to midwicket off the front foot. Stopped by the fielder
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: flighted on his toes, and he caresses this past midwicket's right to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump once more, and Mushfiqur defends with soft hands towards the leg side
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: flatter ball, lands on middle stump,  and he nudges this off his hips to square leg for a quick single
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, and angling across the batsman. Rocks back onto the back foot, and slaps this in front of square to the cover boundary. Excellent shot to end the over. Drinks
items.postText: Jojo: "Pakistan is easing the way for Mushi... I think they should know how destructive he is, if stays till the end.. Do something different to get him out early please" -- As a neutral, I don't mind a Mushi special, to be honest
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.preText: Karthik has dug out a wonderful stat: This is the first time since August 2014 that Bangladesh have gone into an ODI without a frontline left-arm spinner. And only the second time in 16 years. And here's Shadab Khan.
items.text: full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot. Dribbles away to cover
items.postText: Divy: "And they have ended up on losing side in each and every one of those games. Well a tough call this, but they must be telling that there's always a first time. "
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he picks the wrong'un well! Goes down on one knee, and slogs this right over the fielder at midwicket
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full just outside off, and straightens after pitching. He keeps his eyes on the ball, and runs this fine to short third man
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: wrong'un again. Lands outside off, and spinning into Mushi. He makes some room, and cuts this hard, but finds the fielder on the circle
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: reverse sweep! Innovative from Mushfiqur. Shadab goes full outside off, and he quickly changes his position, and then paddles this fine psat the short third-man fielder. Fifty partnership too
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full on off, and he comes onto the front foot to defend. Takes an inside edge and flies away to the leg side
items.postText: Noshirwan Khan: "Good positive cricket from Mushfiq , I am seeing a run out in near future "
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full outside leg stump, and clipped to the vacant square-leg region. Fakhar gives it a chase from midwicket
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and tapped off the front foot to midwicket. No chance of a single on this occasion
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up just outside leg stump, and he nudges this off his toes to deep square leg. Calls early for the seond run, and they complete it with ease
items.shortText: Shoaib Malik to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs
